synopsis.text: Douki-kun, a sought-after office worker, remains oblivious to the romantic turmoil he stirs among his colleagues. Douki-chan, a fellow office lady, harbors deep feelings for him, but her attempts to capture his heart are constantly foiled by her love rivals, Kouhai-chan and Senpai-san. In this engaging web anime adaptation, Douki-chan must outmaneuver her competitors and gather the courage to confess her love to Douki-kun. Will she succeed in winning his affection, or will her rivals triumph in their pursuit? Only time will tell in this entertaining tale of office romance.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
